physical_appearance: This is a pair of trousers. It is vertically striped red, yellow and black, with two strips of green in the middle. The trouserts are mid-length.
sgcool_label_text: Trousers made from handwoven Mashroo silk, belonging to the Ahir community of eastern Kutch.
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Pants Stripes Dhangar (South Asian people)
